name: RoboFish Cleaner
description:
- RoboFish Cleaner -

Game made for #SeaJam. Even if the gamejam lasted 1 month I was busy and I only had 3 days to work on the game.

- Story -

The scientists create a robot that looks like an Angler Fish but made out of metal and that has a propeller under its body and they deployed it in to the ocean to clear the trash thrown there by humans.

- Controls -

"Space Bar" , "Left Mouse Click"  or "Touch the screen" to swim up.

- Goal -

 Your goal is to collect 1000 trash and defeat the boss, after you defeat the boss you can continue playing the endless mode or quit the game.
